title: Add 'Complete' status filter checkbox and new sort options (Title Z–A, Rating Low–High)

requirements.text: Add a new filter control in the manga list filter/controls panel: a checkmark/checkbox labeled "Complete only" that, when checked, restricts the displayed manga list to entries whose completion status is complete (i.e., the entry’s `completed` field is `true`). When unchecked, completed and non-completed entries are both shown.

quotes: add a checkmark onto the filter panel which will show only manga with the 'Complete' status' when checked.

acceptanceCriteria: A new checkbox is visible in the existing floating controls/filter panel with the label "Complete only".
When the checkbox is checked, the list shows only entries where `entry.completed === true`.
When the checkbox is unchecked, entries are not filtered by completion status.
The completion filter composes correctly with existing filters (title/synopsis/notes search, genre selection, and bookmarked-only).
Toggling the completion checkbox updates the list immediately without requiring a page reload.

requirements.text: Extend the existing "Sort By" selector to include two additional sort options: "Title (Z–A)" and "Rating (Low–High)". Ensure sorting behavior matches the selected option and continues to work with filtering and pagination.

quotes: make it so that there is a sorting option for Title (Z-A), as well as Rating (Low-High)

acceptanceCriteria: The "Sort By" dropdown includes at least these options: "Title (A–Z)", "Title (Z–A)", "Rating (High–Low)", and "Rating (Low–High)".
Selecting "Title (Z–A)" sorts entries by title descending (Z to A).
Selecting "Rating (Low–High)" sorts entries by rating ascending (lowest to highest).
Existing sort options continue to work as before.
Sorting applies to the full filtered result set before pagination is applied.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not edit immutable frontend hook files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
nonGoals: No backend (Motoko) API or schema changes are required; use the existing `completed : Bool` field on entries.
Do not add new authentication or persistence behavior for filters/sort beyond the current page state unless explicitly requested.
